name: Arcane Sweeper (Trinket)

active.effects: Summons a mist over the target location for 5 seconds, granting {{tip|sight}} of the area in a 375 radius and {{tip|true sight|revealing}} enemy {{tip|stealthed trap|traps}} within for 3 seconds.

effects_structured.raw: Reveal area (375 radius) for 5s and traps for 3s. Range 800.

simpleDescription: Activate to reveal a nearby area of the map

schema_notes.effects_structured: Parsed from passive/active text for simulation use.
